parameters.name: GroupId
parameters.description: The application ID. You can obtain the application ID on the **Application Management** page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: JobIdList
parameters.description: The job IDs. Multiple job IDs are separated with commas (,).

parameters.name: Namespace
parameters.description: The ID of the namespace to which the job belongs. You can obtain the namespace ID on the **Namespace** page in the SchedulerX console.

parameters.name: NamespaceSource
parameters.description: The source of the namespace. This parameter is required only for a special third party.

parameters.name: RegionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region to which the job belongs.
